name: com.nico-manke.julia-unity-package
description:
This package for the Unity engine allows the user to use and access code written in the Julia programming language.
Developed with Julia 1.6.3 and therefore the recommended version.

samples.description: References the Julia files in the JuliaScripts folder that need to be included.
Contains Julia files that can be included. Needs to be placed in the project directory.
